welcome_message_title: Welcome to Valle de La Pascua
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Valle de La Pascua, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful destination has to offer.

restaurants.address: Avenida Romulo Gallegos, Valle De La Pascua 2350, Estado Guárico
